AILoadBalancing.desc:: Enables load balancing for entity AI. default = true

meanTickAITH.desc:: Mean tick time at which AI load balancing takes effect, 1000 / mean tick time = TPS. default: 55

logEntityAILag.desc:: Whether to debug lagging entities and log offenders, requires load balancing to be enabled. default = true

entityDensity.desc:: Entity density setting, determines how many entities are spawned overall. 1 = Vanilla default, 0.1 e.g 10x less than vanilla. 10 = 10x more than vanilla, default = 1

adaptiveSpeed.desc:: Adapt entity speed to tps, makes entities struggle less with lag. default = true

spawnInterval.desc:: Entity spawn interval setting, determines how frequently entities are spawned overall. 1 = Vanilla default, default = 10

fixLeash.desc:: Fix leash lag from entities on a leash, default = true

fastCollisions.desc:: Enables improved entity collision and movement calculations for any non item entity, default = true

noLagItemPickup.desc:: Enables less laggy entity item pickup, default = true

fastInventoryAdvancement.desc:: Enable fast inventory advancement triggers, many advancements based on items tend to lag the players, default = true

multiEntities.desc:: Enable multithreading support for entities, requires fastCollisions to be enabled. default = true

disableNotifyOnBlockChange.desc:: Disables block changes notifying all entity paths in the world, to possibly adjust their paths, disable with IE, incompat, default = true

slowArmorStands.desc:: Slower updating of armor stands, default = true

enableDynamicEntityRendering.desc:: Enables dynamic entity rendering, stops non-visible entities from beeing rendered but can sometimes cause a slight phasing-in delay. Usually a large boost to fps, default = true. Require restart

excludedRenderHidingMobs.desc:: List of entities excluded from beeing affected by dynamic entity rendering, by entity ID: e.g. format :  ["minecraft:zombie", "minecraft:creeper"]

alwaysglow.desc:: Should entities with glowing effect always be rendered?. default = true

enableDynamicEntityUpdates.desc:: Enables dynamic update distance, it will reduces entity updates when far away from the player, respecting the entities own update range. default = true. Requires restart

entityUpdateDistanceReduction.desc:: Enables dynamic update distance, it will reduces entity updates when far away from the player, respecting the entities own update range. default = true. Requires restart

excludedTickDistanceMobs.desc:: List of entities excluded from beeing affected by dynamic entity updates: e.g. format :  ["minecraft:zombie", "minecraft:creeper"]

goalSelectorTickRate.desc:: Sets the tick interval in which non-running AI tasks are rechecked. Vanilla default is 1(starting with 1.13+), this mods suggested default is 4(as it was in vanilla 1.12)

optimizeTempt.desc:: Enables a slower updated AI tempt goal, tempt is used e.g. for luring sheep with wheat. default = true

optimizeAvoid.desc:: Enables a slower updated AI avoid entity goal, avoid is used e.g. for villagers avoiding zombies so it constantly searches for mobs in the area. default = true

optimizePanic.desc:: Enables a slower updated AI Panic entity goal, panic is used for chickens/other animals running away e.g. on fire. default = true

optimizeBreed.desc:: Enables a slower updated AI Breed entity goal, breed is used for searching nearby similar animals and doesnt have to be checked that often. default = true

slowFindShelter.desc:: Enables a slower updated AI Fox find shelter goal, which causes too much load. default = true

fixBlockBreakGoal.desc:: Fix chunkloading and lag caused by the block break goal, mostly used by zombies or endermen. default = true

cacheRecipes.desc:: Reduces crafting lag by caching recipe lookups, helps a lot with autocrafting/crafting related lag. default = true

fastSpawnRadius.desc:: Enable fast spawn radius check, this makes entity spawn mechanics lag less. default = true

fastChunkBlocks.desc:: Enable fast chunk block ticks, reduces lag on random block ticks in the world but keeps the same growth e.g. on crops. default = true

blockTicks.desc:: Set how many scheduled blocks are updated each tick, scheduled block updates are for example fluid flowing. default = 1000, vanilla default = 65536

fasterHoppers.desc:: If true hoppers are causing less lag

forbiddenMobs.desc:: List of mobs disallowed from spawning: e.g. format :  ["minecraft:zombie", "minecraft:creeper"]

forbiddenCommands.desc:: List of command ID's forbidden from executing: e.g. format :  ["nullscape:clocks/main", "nullscape:clocks/main"]

logintimeout.desc:: Set the max login timeout during connection in ticks. 20 ticks = 1 sec, default = 120 seconds

singlePlayerWatchDogTimeout.desc:: Set the watchdog timeout for the integrated server in miliseconds, -1 Disables it. 1 second = 1000 miliseconds, default = 180000

maxItems.desc:: Set the amount of items at which too many stacked items report their position. Default = 100 items

disconnectTimeout.desc:: Set the ingame disconnect timeout for disconnecting players. Default = 60sec

maxSameSounds.desc:: Set the maximum allowed amount of same sounds playing at the same time. Lowers e.g. lag of flowing water and other cases where a sound is repeated a lot at once. Default = 10

printWorldSaves.desc:: Enable printing of world/chunk saves for debugging purposes, those normally happen every 5minutes. default = false

debugOptionsEnabled.desc:: Enable various debugging error logs, like chunkloading etc. , default = false

displayTooLargePackets.desc:: Enables logging the too large packets causing disconnects. , default = true
